entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gameti
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -42.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gameti Airport 09:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -42.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -46.6°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
